name: Exploding Dice (Fishtail)
description:
Use explosive dice to eliminate the casino chips before they reach your side of the table. Higher rolls cause bigger explosions.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Launch Die
  • P: Pause
  • Esc: Quit

Music: The Jazz Piano by Benjamin Tissot
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/the-jazz-piano
